payload.description: Modify EvidenceDisplay.jsx to add swipe-to-delete gestures. Wrap each evidence block in SwipeableBlock component. Integrate UndoToast on delete. Increase TouchSensor delay from 200ms to 350ms to prevent accidental drags during swipe. Add deleteBlockWithUndo from context.
payload.context: Import SwipeableBlock and UndoToast from ui/mobile. Import useEvidenceEditor hook to access deleteBlockWithUndo. Wrap each block render in <SwipeableBlock onDelete={() => deleteBlockWithUndo(block.id)}>. Update dnd-kit TouchSensor config to { delay: 350, tolerance: 6 }. Show UndoToast when block deleted.
